snippet: Soft round shapes and dusty colors star in Clare Waight Keller's second collection for Chloé.
abstract: Soft round shapes and dusty colors star in Clare Waight Keller's second collection for Chloé.
lead_paragraph: Soft round shapes, softer tie-neck blouses and clean, pleated dresses in even softer dusty colors star in Clare Waight Keller's second collection for Chloé. Paired with all of these pretty, work-ready clothes are accessories that look just as beautiful and uncomplicated, like glossy slip-in ankle boots and slipper-front pumps - and there's a new bag, Lucy, a slim three-pocket with zipper closures that comes in multiple colorways and fabrics, with leather handles or a chain strap. The check version of the bag is shown here with cropped pants, a brushed wool plaid coat and this editor's favorite new flat: an emerald green loafer embellished with metal-tipped fringe.
